headline.main: FINNS HERE FIGHT DIVERSION OF PAY; Crew of Freighter Seeks Aid of Roosevelt to Stop Use of Money by Homeland N.M.U. SUPPORTS APPEAL Asks U.S. to Seize Ship as Men Protest Wages Are Sent Back to Help Hitler

lead_paragraph: Support of an appeal to President Roosevelt by members of the crew of a Finnish freighter now at Newport News, Va., who asked that he move to prevent diversion of part of their earnings to the Government of Finland was announced yesterday by the National Maritime Union, C.I.O.
abstract: Finnish freighter Hammarland's crew asks Roosevelt to seize ship to bar Finland's use of war bonus earnings to aid Axis powers; plea backed by NMU
